*[[File Roller]] - A Unix frontend for extracting ISO files.

*[[Furius ISO Mount]] - Can mount ISO, IMG, BIN, MDF and NRG images. Can also burn ISO and IMG files
*[[KIso]] - An [[open source]] ISO image editing program for the [[KDE|K Desktop Environment]] (KDE).
*[[KIso]] - An [[open source]] ISO image editing program for the [[KDE|K Desktop Environment]] (KDE).
*[[cdrtools|mkisofs]] - this utility, part of the [[cdrtools]] package, can create ISO images from the file system.
*[[cdrtools|mkisofs]] - this utility, part of the [[cdrtools]] package, can create ISO images from the file system.
